GetExtendedDeviceDescriptorSets
GetExtendedDeviceDescriptorSets

Contains the logic for the Inertial "Get Extended Device Descriptor Sets" command

Constants
Packet Bytes
CMD_ID

CMD_GET_EXT_DESCRIPTOR_SETS  - The MipTypes::Command for this command

FIELD_DATA_BYTE

0x86  - The Data Field Descriptor byte

Functions
buildCommand
static ByteStream buildCommand()

Builds the command packet

Returns

A ByteStream containing the Inertial GetExtendedDeviceDescriptorSets command packet
